meanings.sent1: The sharp knife had a penetrative tip.

meanings.sent1: The key had a penetrative ability to unlock the door.

meanings.sent5: The penetrative roots of the tree broke through the concrete.

meanings.definition: Capable of understanding or grasping deeply
